titleInfo.title: Subdivision of lots 7 & 8 and east half of lot 6 in Michael Aikmans survey

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; 50 x 31 cm. Light hint of colour on roadways. Map lined with archival paper on verso. Notes and numbers are scribbled throughout the map.

mods.note: "Scale 50 ft = 1 Inch." On left edge of map it reads, "No 57 Drawer 2". The map is oriented so that the north arrow points to the bottom of the map and south is at the top. Streets listed are: Wentworth Street, Main Street, and Ida Street. Ida Street, which can be found as such on Hamilton maps between 1903 and 1910, is now known as Delaware Avenue.
